Unicode 字节顺序标记（BOM）按以下方式序列化（十六进制）：The Unicode byte order mark (BOM) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - UTF-8： EF BB BFUTF-8: EF BB BF - UTF-16 大 endian 字节顺序： FE FFUTF-16 big endian byte order: FE FF - UTF-16 little endian 字节顺序： FF FEUTF-16 little endian byte order: FF FE - 32大 endian 字节顺序： 00 00 FE FFUTF-32 big endian byte order: 00 00 FE FF - 32 little endian 字节顺序： FF FE 00 00UTF-32 little endian byte order: FF FE 00 00 应使用 BOM，因为它提供了对文件的编码的几乎某些标识，例如，对对象的引用丢失 、未标记或标记不正确或标记为不正确的 web 数据或随机文本文件。You should use the BOM, because it provides nearly certain identification of an encoding for files that otherwise have lost reference to the object, for example, untagged or improperly tagged web data or random text files stored when a business did not have international concerns or other data. 如果数据一致且标记正确（最好是 UTF-8 或 UTF-16），通常可以避免用户问题。Often user problems might be avoided if data is consistently and properly tagged, preferably in UTF-8 or UTF-16. 对于提供编码类型的标准，BOM 有些多余。For standards that provide an encoding type, a BOM is somewhat redundant. 但是，可以使用它来帮助服务器发送正确的编码标头。However, it can be used to help a server send the correct encoding header. 或者，它可以用作回退，以防编码在其他情况下丢失。Alternatively, it can be used as a fallback in case the encoding is otherwise lost. 使用 BOM 存在一些缺点。There are some disadvantages to using a BOM. 例如，了解如何限制使用 BOM 的数据库字段可能很困难。For example, knowing how to limit the database fields that use a BOM can be difficult. 文件的串联可能也是一个问题，例如，当文件以这样一种方式进行合并时，不需要的字符会在数据中间结束。Concatenation of files can be a problem also, for example, when files are merged in such a way that an unnecessary character can end up in the middle of data. 尽管有几个缺点，但强烈建议使用 BOM。Despite the few disadvantages, however, the use of a BOM is highly recommended. 有关字节顺序和字节顺序标记的详细信息，请参阅[unicode 它将返回一个 对象，该对象使用替换回退来替换每个无法编码的字符串，以及无法使用问号（"？"）字符解码的每个字节。It returns a object that uses replacement fallback to replace each string that it can't encode and each byte that it can't decode with a question mark ("?") character. 相反，你可以调用 构造函数来实例化 其回退为 或的对象 ，如下例所示。Instead, you can call the constructor to instantiate a object whose fallback is either an or a , as the following example illustrates. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/cs/encoding.utf8.1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/vb/encoding.utf8.1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个包含以下字符的数组：The following example defines an array that consists of the following characters: - 希腊文小写字母 BETA （U + 03B2）GREEK SMALL LETTER BETA (U+03B2) - 构成希腊语 ACROPHONIC 阁楼 1000 STATERS （U + 10154）的代理项对（U + D800 U + DD54）。A surrogate pair (U+D800 U+DD54) that forms GREEK ACROPHONIC ATTIC ONE THOUSAND STATERS (U+10154). 它显示每个字符的 UTF-16 代码单元，并确定 UTF-8 编码器对字符数组进行编码所需的字节数。It displays the UTF-16 code units of each character and determines the number of bytes required by a UTF-8 encoder to encode the character array. 然后，它对字符进行编码，并显示生成的 UTF-8 编码字节。It then encodes the characters and displays the resulting UTF-8-encoded bytes. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/cs/example1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.encoding.utf8/vb/example1.vb" id="Snippet2":::
